alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 14 at 5:52AM EDT until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The water reaches Riverside Road at Kent School and floods the picnic area along Route 7 near Housatonic Meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EDT Friday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then rise to 7.7 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.6 feet on 04/14/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Fri 5 am: 7.0 Forecast: Fri 8 am 7.2 Fri 2 pm 7.2 Fri 8 pm 7.2 Sat 2 am 7.3 Sat 8 am 7.3 Sat 2 pm 7.4 Sat 8 pm 7.4 Sun 2 am 7.3 Sun 8 am 7.1 Sun 2 pm 7.1 Sun 8 pm 7.3 Mon 2 am 7.7 &&
